LanguageData.CommandDescriptionShackle: Mark whether or not {0} is to be shackled. Shackled slaves are unable to move quickly, making them easier to catch but less productive.
LanguageData.Desc_CollarExplosive_Arm: Ready the explosives in the slave collar for detonation.
LanguageData.Desc_CollarExplosive_Detonate: Detonate the explosives in the collar, instantly killing the wearer.
LanguageData.ReasonArmedExplosiveCollar: Explosive collar was armed to detonate.
LanguageData.LetterIncidentECHeartAttack: {0} is having a heart attack from an electric shock!
LanguageData.ReasonFailedSetSlaveCollar: {0} is trying to wear a slave collar to {1}.
LanguageData.shacklesDefaultSetting_desc: Choose whether to put the shackles on when you enslave the pawn. Default: On
LanguageData.slavestageEnableSetting_desc: Choose whether to activate the slave's emotional changes. Default: On
LanguageData.rebelcyclechangeEnableSetting_desc: Choose whether to enable Rebellion Cycle Change by Slave Stage. If the slave stage is off, it has no effect. Default: On
LanguageData.removeworkspeeddebuffEnableSetting_title: Remove Global Work Speed Debuff On/Off
LanguageData.removeworkspeeddebuffEnableSetting_desc: Choose whether to Remove Global Work Speed Debuff by Slave Stage. If the slave stage or reduce rebellion cycle is off, it has no effect. Default: On
LanguageData.assignslaveEnableSetting_desc: Choose whether to allow slaves to be assigned to roles. If the slave stage or reduce rebellion cycle is off, it has no effect. Default: On
LanguageData.stage5SlaveWorkUnlockEnableSetting_title: Unlock Work Restrictions for Stage 5 Slaves On/Off
LanguageData.stage5SlaveWorkUnlockEnableSetting_desc: Allows stage 5 slaves to perform all work types without restrictions, just like colonists. If Slave Stage or Reduce Rebellion Cycle is off, this option has no effect. Default: On
LanguageData.assimilationslaveEnableSetting_desc: Choose whether to allow the slave's home faction to be changed to the player's faction when the slave stage reaches level 5. If you release the slave who has become the player's faction, the slave will join the settlement. If the slave stage is off, it has no effect. Default: On
LanguageData.remoteOnlyOnConsoleEnableSetting_title: Activate Collars Only at Comms Console On/Off
LanguageData.remoteOnlyOnConsoleEnableSetting_desc: Choose whether the remote activation button for slave collars can only be operated from the Comms Console, and not directly by the slaves. When remote activation is attempted, a colonist must go to the Comms Console to activate it manually. Default: On
LanguageData.slavestage1Period_desc: Sets the slave stage 1 period. Default: 15 days
LanguageData.slavestage2Period_desc: Sets the slave stage 2 period. Default: 15 days
LanguageData.slavestage3Period_desc: Sets the slave stage 3 period. Default: 15 days
LanguageData.slavestage4Period_desc: Sets the slave stage 4 period. Default: 15 days
LanguageData.RoleRequirementLabelSlaveStage: Must be at least slave stage 5
LanguageData.Desc_CollarExplosive_Arm_Remote: Ready the explosives in the slave collar for detonation.
LanguageData.Desc_CollarExplosive_Detonate_Remote: Detonate the explosives in the collar, instantly killing the wearer.
LanguageData.Desc_CollarExplosive_Arm_Console: Select pawns wearing explosive collars to arm them for detonation.
LanguageData.Desc_CollarExplosive_Disarm_Console: Select pawns wearing explosive collars to disarm them.
LanguageData.Desc_CollarExplosive_Detonate_Console: Select armed explosive collar wearers to detonate their collars.
LanguageData.Desc_CollarElectric_Arm_Console: Select pawns wearing shock collars to zap them into unconsciousness.
LanguageData.Desc_CollarElectric_Disarm_Console: Select pawns wearing shock collars to disarm them.
LanguageData.Desc_CollarCrypto_Arm_Console: Select pawns wearing cryo collars to freeze them in place.
LanguageData.Desc_CollarCrypto_Disarm_Console: Select pawns wearing cryo collars to disarm them.
LanguageData.MessageAssimilationSlave: [PAWN_nameDef] is assimilated into the settlement and considers the settlement [PAWN_possessive] home.
LanguageData.SimpleSlaveryCollars_NoAssignableRole: No assignable roles are available for this slave.
LanguageData.RemoteCollar_ExecuteForGroup: Execute on all selected group members
LanguageData.RemoteCollar_CancelAllReservations: Cancel all reservations for selected group
LanguageData.RemoteCollar_NoEligiblePawn: There are no eligible pawns in the selected group for this operation.
LanguageData.Desc_CollarRemoteOnly: This command can only be used from the console.
LanguageData.Reason_CollarRemoteOnly: Can only be operated from the console.
LanguageData.RemoteCollar_ReservedJob: {1} operation has been scheduled for {0}. (Cannot operate on their own collar.)
LanguageData.RemoteCollar_GroupReserved: {1} operation(s) have been scheduled for {0} pawn(s).
LanguageData.RemoteCollar_AlreadyReserved: This operation has already been scheduled.
LanguageData.RemoteCollar_AllReservationsCancelled: All scheduled {1} operation(s) for {0} pawn(s) have been cancelled.
